DOC.brief_summary: Endoscopic retrograde cholangiopancreatography ( ERCP ) plastic stent placement resolution biliary obstruction method choice many year . However , stent clogging/obstruction major limitation management biliary obstruction . Studies show conventional tubular type polyethylene stent ( CS ) side hole accumulate significant sludge mean patency approximately 90 day . Thus patient require long term stenting need undergo stent exchange every 2-3 month . Recently , stent star-shaped cross-section develop biliary application . This FDA approve biliary Wing stent ( WS ) ( ViaDuct™ ) novel plastic biliary stent lack lumen , design allow bile flow outside stent . The stent star shape cross section , channel fluid along wing perimeter . It propose winged stent design lack central lumen obviate risk luminal occlusion risk occlusion , give presence multiple external drainage channel , small . Longer term biliary drainage without need stent exchange therefore possible stent . The primary aim study prospectively evaluate patency rate WS 90 day 50 patient biliary obstruction due stone benign stricture .
